snippet.title: Marko: Beyond Brave Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Marko: Beyond Brave is an action-packed Metroidvania, inspired by games such as Ori and the Blind Forest, Hollow Knight, Guacamelee, Slavic folklore, and legends.
Back us on Kickstarter: https://markobeyondbrave.com/kickstarter

Find out more at:
Website: https://markobeyondbrave.com
Facebook: https://facebook.com/MarkoBeyondBrave
Twitter: @BraveMarko
Reddit: r/markobeyondbrave
#Metroidvania #Kickstarter #Gaming

Game Development:
Studio Mechka
www.studiomechka.com
Composing and music production:
Iavor Pachovski
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrjFvYltHu2CRHZ3GEwvzDw
Kaval performance:
Hristian Georgiev (Oratnitza, Merudia)
https://www.youtube.com/c/FusionEmbassy
